def siegfried(week, txt):
    txt = txt.replace("I", "i")  # handle capital 'I' at the beginning of a sentence

        pattern = patterns[i-1]

    txt = txt.replace("i ", "I ")  # handle capital 'I' at the beginning of a sentence
